summary: This is a Daily Activity Report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 3, 2019, summarizing operations for August 2, 2019. It details inmate movements, staff assignments, leave usage, and institutional totals, and notably lists inmates placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

events.title: Daily Prison Operations
events.description: Routine daily operations at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, including inmate movements to the Special Housing Unit, new admissions, releases, and staff assignments.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a routine prison operations report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 3, 2019, detailing activities from August 2, 2019.
Five inmates (Cave, Contreras, Fernandez, Santos, Gouldbourne) were placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU), with Gouldbourne's placement pending a Special Investigative Services (SIS) review.
Inmate Melendez was reported to be at a local hospital under USMS guard and on suicide watch with an inmate companion.
The report lists seven new admissions and thirteen releases from the MCC, along with staff leave usage and overtime details.
The document shows no cells in the SHU were triple-bunked as of the report date.
